articles.title: Adobe unveils AI platform to personalise & control brand assets
articles.author: IT Brief New Zealand
articles.summary: Adobe launched Brand Concierge, an AI platform. Brand Concierge centralizes creative assets and delivers personalized, brand-compliant content across customer journeys.

articles.title: Chick-fil-A selects San Antonio to test limited-time Chicken & Waffles Sandwich! But for how long?
articles.summary: Chick-fil-A is testing its new, limited-time Chicken & Waffles Breakfast Sandwich and a Chicken & Waffles Sandwich in San Antonio and Baltimore from December 1 to January 24. Select restaurants in San Antonio are testing only the breakfast version.

articles.title: A look inside Gulfport's new Aldi
articles.summary: ALDI's had a soft launch for its Gulfport location today.

articles.title: My Sister Introduced Me to Her Favorite $3 Aldi Bakery Find, and Now I Buy It Every Week (for Breakfast AND Dinner!)
articles.author: Alice Bennett
articles.summary: Aldi's Specially Selected Naan Flatbread is now available in original, garlic, and mini versions, retailing for under $6 for four pieces. The naan has a soft, chewy texture and can be used in various ways, such as a snack, sandwich base, or pizza crust.

articles.title: Hyundai Slogans Through the Years: How 'Cars That Make Sense' Evolved Into 'Next Awaits'
articles.author: Cobus F. Potgieter
articles.summary: Hyundai has used the slogan "Next Awaits" since 2019 as part of the Progress marketing campaign, focusing on the future of mobility. In 2011, Hyundai introduced "New Thinking. New Possibilities," a campaign highlighting innovation and emotional value in their vehicles, signaling a shift toward a 'Modern Premium' market position. The company's move into smart mobility solutions also led to the "Once Upon a Time, Hyundai Was a Car Company" campaign to signal their transformation.

articles.title: I tried 10 laundry baskets to find the best hamper in the US – these are my favorites after at-home testing
articles.author: Margaret Eby
articles.summary: The Sterilite Ultra 2 Bushel Basket is highlighted for its heavy-duty construction and spacious capacity. The Sammart Collapsible Laundry Basket is featured for its space-saving design, ideal for smaller living spaces. The Yamazaki Tosca Slim Rolling Basket is praised for its stylish design and functionality, while the Ikea Frakta Bag is noted for its affordability and large carrying capacity. Steele Canvas Small Truck are industrial-looking solution and CleverMade Collapsible Fabric Laundry Basket is constructed like a giant tote bag.

articles.title: Amazon Debuts AI-Powered Tools for Business Clients
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Amazon introduced new AI-powered tools. These tools are designed for its business clients.

articles.title: Samsung to release trifold smartphone next month
articles.author: 강윤승
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will release its new trifold smartphone next month, with a launch ceremony scheduled for December 5. The device folds twice in three sections, offering a 10-inch display when fully unfolded. Samsung plans to release the product initially in major markets, including China, Singapore and the United Arab Emirates.

articles.title: Assetto Corsa Rally, Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, and Anno 117: Pax Romana Will Launch With NVIDIA DLSS 4 Support
articles.summary: NVIDIA will launch DLSS 4 support for new titles, including Assetto Corsa Rally. Supernova Games Studios and 505 Games are launching Assetto Corsa Rally, which is a new rally racing game and the first of the Assetto Corsa series to venture into rally racing.

articles.title: Red Dot Celebrates 60 Years with Vision for the Future: REDy for Anything
articles.author: Red Dot
articles.summary: Red Dot Corporation, a leader in heavy-duty mobile HVAC systems, is launching a new brand platform called 'REDy for anything' to celebrate its 60th anniversary. This platform represents an expansive vision for the company's future, including expansion into emerging markets while maintaining commitment to existing values.

articles.title: Reddit Launches New WooCommerce Integration
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Reddit announced a new integration with WooCommerce that enables WooCommerce merchants to connect their product listings to Reddit ads. The integration will provide more data on performance, fed directly into the WooCommerce system, and enable merchants to list products and prices within their Reddit promotions based on inventory.

articles.title: This Dyson Vacuum Is So Light, It's Like ‘Waving A Magic Wand Around' — And It's 55% Off If You Hurry
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: Dyson launched the Dyson V9 Motorbar, a new lightweight cordless stick vacuum cleaner with up to 40 minutes of runtime and a Hyperdymium motor reaching 120,000 rpm. It features an LCD screen for mode selection (Eco, Auto, Boost) and tangle-free brush attachments for pet hair, and is available at a discounted price on Amazon.

articles.title: It will sell fast - Next's 'elegant' £46 Christmas dress is designed to flatter
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Next has launched a satin Christmas dress priced at £46, featuring a twist front design and available in three colors. New Look is selling a side Knot Ruched Long Sleeve Midi Dress for £33.99 and Nobody's Child offers a Balloon Sleeve Adina Midi Dress. M&S features a Cotton Rich Velvet Embellished Mini Skater Dress for £60.

articles.title: 6sense Introduces RevvyAI, Turning the Platform Into an AI-Powered GTM Command Center
articles.summary: 6sense launched RevvyAI, a significant update to its platform that introduces AI-powered capabilities for go-to-market execution. RevvyAI provides revenue teams with an AI partner through features like Conversational Interface, Specialized Agents, and Persona-based Agentic Workspaces. The update aims to improve efficiency and growth for organizations by helping them create higher-quality pipeline and increase deal size.

articles.title: 6sense Introduces RevvyAI, Turning the Platform Into an AI-Powered GTM Command Center
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: 6sense introduced RevvyAI TM, a significant update to their platform. RevvyAI serves as an intelligent command center that aims to redefine customer interaction with data and insights, transforming 6sense into a GTM central nervous system.

articles.title: Aldi beauty dupes: Lush Snow Angel and Bath and Body Works
articles.author: Jade Wright
articles.summary: Aldi launched new Lacura Vanilla and Sweet Angel Body Scrubs & Lotions on November 23rd, positioned as affordable alternatives to Bath and Body Works and Lush products. Aldi also introduced new Hotel Collection Classic Ceramic Candles and XXL Hurricane Candles, available in various scents, which are positioned as cheaper alternatives to other brands.

articles.title: Aldi beauty dupes of Lush Snow Angel and Bath and Body Works 90 per cent cheaper
articles.author: Jade Wright
articles.summary: Aldi launched new Lacura Vanilla and Sweet Angel body scrubs and lotions as cheaper alternatives to Bath and Body Works and Lush. Aldi's new Body Scrubs & Lotions are available in stores nationwide from 23rd November, while stocks last. Aldi also launched a winter home fragrance collection of dupes with 30 seasonal scents.

articles.title: New Agency Declares War on Tech Jargon
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Narrative Supply, founded by Adam Lambert, is launching as a story-driven marketing agency. It is focused on helping tech companies improve their messaging and ensuring their products get the attention they deserve. The agency delivers complete messaging frameworks and executive narratives.

articles.title: San Antonio Chick-fil-A fans will get first dibs to test new menu item
articles.author: The Tribune
articles.summary: Chick-fil-A is testing a new "Chicken & Waffles Breakfast Sandwich" in select San Antonio locations from December 1st to January 24th. This breakfast sandwich is part of a larger effort to potentially roll out chicken-and-waffle items for both breakfast and lunch menus. Select Baltimore stores will test the "Chicken & Waffles" lunch sandwich.

articles.title: Rutgers Unveils a Brand-New Jersey Tomato
articles.author: Ben Wasserman
articles.summary: Rutgers unveiled the Scarlet Sunrise, a new sweet grape tomato variety. The variety was developed over a decade of crossbreeding.

articles.title: Productivity app Hero announces an SDK that will complete your AI prompts for you
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Hero, a productivity startup, has launched an invite-only autocompletion SDK that anticipates and populates fields in prompts based on context, aiming to speed up interactions with AI apps. Adobe's Firefly app now includes a feature allowing users to easily create soundtracks by entering keywords for mood, style, and purpose.

articles.title: Samsung to Launch Its First Dual-Folding Smartphone, the Galaxy Z Trifold
articles.author: Korea Bizwire
articles.summary: Samsung is set to launch its first dual-folding smartphone, the Galaxy Z Trifold, next month, with an official launch event on December 5. The phone will initially be available in key Asian markets such as South Korea, China, Singapore, and Dubai, with a price ranging between $2,750 and $2,900. Initial production will be limited to around 20,000 to 30,000 units.

articles.title: Retro N64 Machine Analogue 3D Finally Ships Next Week
articles.author: Tech Raptor
articles.summary: Analogue 3D has a shipping date that is coming up soon. This allows users to use their old N64 cartridges.

articles.title: DreamPark Launches 'Theme Park as a Service,' Bringing Mixed-Reality Attractions to Any Venue in Days
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: DreamPark announced Theme Park as a Service (TPaaS), a turnkey solution. TPaaS is for independent creators. It is a downloadable mixed-reality theme-park platform.

articles.title: New Cannabis Dispensary Will Celebrate Grand Opening In East Orange
articles.author: Eric Kiefer
articles.summary: HZY Goods, an independent cannabis dispensary, is celebrating its grand opening on November 13th at 19 Prospect Street in East Orange. The event includes tours, discounts, giveaways, and aims to provide a unique cannabis experience rooted in the local community.

articles.title: G-Shock's Dazzling New Take on Its Original Flagship Watch Has Instant Classic Written All Over It
articles.author: Sean Tirman
articles.summary: G-Shock has launched new iterations of its iconic 5600 series with the G-Shock GM-5600M-1JF and GM-5600BM-1JF models. These reinterpretations feature a stainless steel bezel with a unique texture while maintaining the original size and octagonal case design.

articles.title: OnePlus 15: Key features you should know about Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5-powered Android flagship
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: OnePlus India is teasing the OnePlus 15 series, specifically the Sand Storm variant, suggesting an upcoming product launch or introduction.

articles.title: Browsers Can Now Do Tasks For You - Here's What Agentic AI Means
articles.author: Bob Sharp
articles.summary: Agentic AI browsers, such as OpenAI's ChatGPT Atlas, Opera's Neon Browser, and Perplexity's Comet, are emerging as a new type of browser that autonomously carries out multi-step tasks on a user's behalf, acting as AI assistants.  These browsers use AI to book flights and restaurant tables, shop online, and compile information summaries from multiple sources. However, security vulnerabilities, like prompt injection in ChatGPT Atlas and data security in Perplexity's Comet, are being identified.

articles.title: .NET 10 Released as New Long Term Support (LTS)
articles.author: Ubuntu Handbook
articles.summary: Microsoft announced the launch of .NET 10, a free, open-source, cross-platform developer platform. This Long Term Support (LTS) release provides three years of support, extending until November 10, 2028, and includes performance improvements and new features.

articles.title: Ashok Leyland to inaugurate its EV manufacturing at Lucknow in 30-60 days
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: The company will launch its first bi-fuel product in the LCV range this fiscal year. This new product expands the company's offering in the light commercial vehicle market.

articles.title: be!MYN, a Gen Z-first beauty brand to encourage self-expression, now available on Myntra
articles.author: ET Spotlight
articles.summary: Myntra Beauty has launched a new beauty brand called be!MYN, targeting Gen Z consumers. The brand features a range of 27 SKUs including lipsticks and kajal, formulated with hydrating ingredients and designed for Indian skin tones and conditions. The products are vegan, paraben-free and dermatologically tested.

articles.title: Newsweek New & Noteworthy: Products You Need to Try (Nov 12, 2025)
articles.author: Adam Mills
articles.summary: Tide launched an upgraded Original Liquid Detergent with a Boosted Formula. Honey Bunches of Oats introduced a limited-time Sugar Cookie cereal. Erewhon released the Strawberry Glaze Skin Smoothie Kit, featuring pre-portioned ingredients and MALK Organic Almond Milk. Other product launches include Shea Moisture Manuka Honey & Oatmeal Soap, Coppertone Sport Face Sunscreen, VTech V-Hush Rocker Soother, Dove Men+Care Whole Body Deodorant Spray, Dole Colada Royale Pineapple, Vital Proteins Active Complex, and iPaw Turkey Tendon.

articles.title: ZIPPY MATTRESS Launches Arkansas­-Only E-Commerce Store, Offering Next-Day Delivery on Select Mattresses
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Zippy Mattress has launched a new e-commerce store in Arkansas, offering next-day delivery of mattresses and sleep accessories. The store allows Arkansas residents to shop online and receive fast, local delivery, providing a convenient alternative to large-chain mattress purchases.

articles.title: NETFLIX HOUSE PHILADELPHIA IS NOW OPEN. WELCOME TO OUR HOME!
articles.author: Netflix
articles.summary: Netflix unveiled "Inside," showcasing new images, behind-the-scenes featurettes, and drone fly-throughs. It also features a collection of shows and movies, the new Netflix BITES Menu, and exclusive merchandise. These offerings provide customers with new ways to explore and interact with Netflix content.

articles.title: $599 Even G2 Takes On Meta AI Smart Glasses With Nimble, Camera-Free Design
articles.author: Chris Smith
articles.summary: Even Realities has launched the Even G2 Display Smart Glasses and the Even R1 Smart Ring. The G2 glasses, priced at $599, feature built-in AI capabilities, a multi-layer 3D floating spatial display, and improved privacy by lacking a camera and speaker. The R1 Smart Ring, priced at $249, acts as a controller for the glasses and offers health sensors. Both products are available globally, with early G2 buyers receiving a discount on the R1 and accessories.

articles.title: This compact label printer is already proving its worth in my office - here's how
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: The Nelko label maker is a compact device. It connects to phones or laptops through an app.

articles.title: DAVE & BUSTER'S IS SERVING UP ITS MOST FLAVORFUL MENU YET WITH 100+ NEW MENU ...
articles.author: The Facts
articles.summary: A restaurant brand is debuting a new menu. This menu includes the return of classic dishes like the Million Dollar Margarita, Lacy's Chicken, and Mountain O'Nachos. The menu also features bold new dishes.

articles.title: DreamCloud mattresses are up to 60% off for Black Friday 2025
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: DreamCloud is offering up to 60% off select mattresses, including their best-selling queen size hybrid for $699, plus $599 of free bedding accessories, during their early Black Friday mattress sales. DreamCloud mattresses come with a 365-night home trial and a lifetime warranty covering defects in materials or workmanship.

articles.title: DreamCloud mattresses are up to 60% off for Black Friday 2025
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: DreamCloud is offering early Black Friday mattress discounts. Their mattresses come with a lifetime warranty covering material and workmanship defects and a 365-night trial period allowing for returns within a year for a full refund if not satisfied.

articles.title: Making the case for silk pillowcases: What to know
articles.author: Kate Mendonca
articles.summary: Slip offers silk pillowcases proven to reduce frizz, while Blissy's pillowcases help skin stay hydrated. Silk & Snow provides soft, luxurious pillowcases, and Cozy Earth utilizes high-quality silk. Lunya offers a washable silk option, and Bedsure provides satin alternatives, giving shoppers wide array of options for their needs.

articles.title: Aviatrix� Launches Zero Trust for Workloads: Pervasive Cross-Cloud Enforcement for AI and Cloud Native Environments
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: A new product line offers inline Zero Trust enforcement and continuous visibility across VMs. This new offering aims to enhance security and monitoring capabilities.

articles.title: Deltek Unveils Intelligent Platform Innovations that Elevate the Project Lifecycle
articles.summary: Deltek launched its next-generation platform, featuring Dela, an AI orchestrator.  The company also introduced three new AI-powered capabilities: Deltek Proposals for AI-generated proposal creation, Deltek PPM Enterprise Risk for AI-driven risk management, and Deltek Agentic Financial Close for AI-powered financial reconciliation. These new products aim to enhance speed, clarity, and control for project-based businesses.

articles.title: 'My clothes are crease-free after adding 1 item to my tumble dryer – just 33p'
articles.author: Sophie Harris
articles.summary: Tumble dryer balls from 'The Range' are used to reduce drying time, soften clothes, reduce static, and prevent clumping. A pack of three costs £1, and users typically put one to three balls in the dryer, depending on the load. They help separate fabric and improve airflow, resulting in faster and less creased drying.

articles.title: Fei-Fei Li's World Labs speeds up the world model race with Marble, its first commercial product
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: World Labs is launching Marble, its first commercial world model product. Marble allows users to transform text prompts, photos, videos, 3D layouts, or panoramas into editable and downloadable 3D environments. This launch makes Marble available via freemium and paid tiers.

articles.title: Random Ramsdom: New jerseys to debut Sunday
articles.author: Yahoo Daily News
articles.summary: The Los Angeles Rams are launching a new jersey called 'Midnight Mode' this coming Sunday. This new uniform is a new version of their merchandise.

articles.title: Rocket Software Unveils Next Evolution of DevOps Tools That Evolve the Developer Experience to Bridge IT Skills Gap Across Core IT Systems
articles.summary: Rocket Software has launched new AI-driven innovations designed to improve developer experience (DevEx) and agility across various platforms, including IBM Z and IBM i. The advancements feature deeper automation and intuitive workflows to enable faster, higher-quality releases. These solutions aim to empower every developer, modernizing DevOps practices.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 Launch In India On November 13: Features, Expected Price, And How To Watch Live
articles.author: Mohit.Bisht
articles.summary: OnePlus will launch its new flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 15, in India on November 13, 2025, at 7:00 PM IST. The launch will be streamed live, with sales starting at 8:00 PM IST via Amazon India and OnePlus India's online store. The OnePlus 15 features the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset.

articles.title: NECF Launches Patented AI Platform That Turns Idle Control Rooms, Cloud Time, and Edit Bays into Instant Revenue
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: NECF Corporation has launched MediaXBook, an AI-powered marketplace designed to solve the media industry's challenge of unused production capacity. This platform matches unused resources with companies in need, aiming to reduce costs and create new revenue streams. MediaXBook is currently in private beta.

articles.title: AI Clothes Changer and AI Hairstyle Changer: The Future of Virtual Transformation
articles.author: Special Features Desk
articles.summary: AI clothes changers and AI hairstyle changers are introduced as technologies transforming the fashion and beauty industries. AI clothes changers allow virtual try-ons for online retailers, and design clothing for digital avatars, while AI hairstyle changers enable users to experiment with different hairstyles. These tools enhance the shopping experience and customize digital appearances.

articles.title: I tried sourdough from Aldi, Asda, Sainsbury's and Tesco — 1 was cheaper and better than Jason's
articles.author: Nicola Roy
articles.summary: The article reviews sourdough bread options from Jason's, Asda, Aldi, Sainsbury's and Tesco. Tesco's sourdough bread emerges as the preferred choice, praised for its crust, flavor, and value, particularly when purchased with a Clubcard, costing £1.75. This is despite containing some holes in the bread, a feature absent in Jason's bread.

articles.title: MiniMax AI: Advanced Language Models Made Simple
articles.author: Neel Achary
articles.summary: MiniMax AI launched the MiniMax AI Chat platform, offering access to their M1 and M2 language models. The M1 model, launched in June 2025, features a 456 billion parameter architecture with a 1 million-token context window, while the M2 model is optimized for advanced coding tasks. This platform aims to provide accessible AI tools for developers and organizations.

articles.title: I want this ColorOS 16 feature on every Android phone
articles.author: Harish Jonnalagadda
articles.summary: OPPO's ColorOS 16 introduces new features to its app drawer, including alphabetized sorting and auto-categorization of apps. The updated app drawer provides an easier way to sort and launch apps and emulates iOS functionality by sorting apps into folders automatically.

articles.title: 5 Things You Should Know About The 2026 Omoda 9 SHS
articles.author: Matthew MacConnell
articles.summary: Omoda is launching the 2026 Omoda 9 SHS, a plug-in hybrid SUV with an excellent electric range of around 87-93 miles and an overall range of 610 miles. The Omoda 9 SHS has competitive price of £44,990 and is packed with technology, including wireless phone charging, Apple CarPlay, a 540-degree camera system, and a 14-speaker Sony audio system.

articles.title: Elias Torres's Agency raises $20 million Series A to chase agentic AI for customer success
articles.author: Allie Garfinkle
articles.summary: Agency, cofounded by Elias Torres and Luke Van Seters, has launched its first key product, Kai, an AI agent for customer service. The company also raised $20 million in Series A funding, led by Menlo Ventures, with participation from Sequoia, Felicis, Snowflake Ventures, and Databricks Ventures. Kai is designed to automate customer service by drawing data from emails, Slack, support tickets, and product usage.

articles.title: Carl's Jr. Heats Up Value Wars with New Cali XL Burger and "Sad Mac Buy Back"
articles.author: Citizen Tribune
articles.summary: Carl's Jr. is introducing new products featuring double the beef and bold new flavors. This is in direct response to consumers' demand for bigger and better deals within the fast-food industry, presenting a challenge to competitors.

articles.title: MONSTER ENERGY UNLEASHES ULTRA WILD PASSION
articles.author: Monster Energy
articles.summary: Monster Energy launched Ultra Wild Passion, a new addition to its Monster Energy Ultra lineup. This new beverage features a passionfruit flavor, zero sugar, and provides an energy boost.

articles.title: Tool, teammate or threat? Experimenting with AI in digital product design
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: ustwo explored AI's role in modern product development by building a minimum testable product for Soph's Plant Kitchen, a plant-based meal planning venture. They leveraged AI tools such as UIzard and v0 for UI exploration and ChatPRD to generate backlogs.  The experiment helped to understand how AI output was 'good enough', and when it needed human intervention.

articles.title: Color Wow 'best ever' dry shampoo takes hair from 'oily to fresh looking in minutes'
articles.author: Jessica Brunt
articles.summary: Color Wow has launched its Insta-WOW Advanced Dry Shampoo, a product designed to clean hair like a real shampoo and remove up to 95% of sebum. The £26.50 formula employs a shampoo-grade cleanser and high-performance starches to absorb oil and sweat, promising virtually no residue and a floral fragrance.

articles.title: KFC launches Stranger Things burger and fans are all asking the same question
articles.author: Paige Freshwater
articles.summary: KFC has launched a limited-edition Stranger Things Burger and Stranger Wings to coincide with the final season of the series on Netflix. The Stranger Things Burger features a spicy Zinger fillet, sweet and spicy Secret Sauce, cheese, pickled slaw, and a limited-edition red glazed bun, available for a limited time for collection and delivery.

articles.title: The battle to build humanoid robots will intensify
articles.author: Alex Hern
articles.summary: 1x plans to deploy 10,000 "Neo" humanoid robots in homes globally by the end of 2026. The "Neo" robot, designed as a domestic assistant, currently requires remote human supervision for basic tasks.

articles.title: 47 Thoughtful Gifts Under $25 That Won't Break The Bank
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: Blank Beauty introduces a service of custom nail polish. Customers can upload a picture and create nail polish in a custom color based on the image. The service allows for personalized nail polish inspired by photos, offering a unique beauty product.

articles.title: Nextdoor Introduces AI-Driven Ad Performance Optimization and New Video Ad Formats
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Nextdoor Holdings, Inc. is launching AI-powered ad optimizations and new video formats. These features are available through the Nextdoor Advertising Manager (NAM) platform. The company is also piloting locally personalized advertisements to enhance hyperlocal advertising capabilities.

articles.title: Russians Unveil Vodka-Fuelled Drunk Robot
articles.author: Daily Squib
articles.summary: A Russian robotics company unveiled "Vdryzg P'yanyy 1.0", the world's first vodka-fueled robot. The robot, which consumes RussoBaltique Vodka, will be available to Russian consumers by 2028 and can projectile vomit on command. Its creation was praised by Vladimir Putin, who requested it to be weaponized.

articles.title: 'I tried KFC's new Stranger Things-themed burger but was left scratching my head'
articles.author: Paige Freshwater
articles.summary: KFC has launched a limited edition Stranger Things-themed burger and wings. The burger features a spicy Zinger fillet with a sweet and spicy secret sauce, cheese, pickled slaw, burger dressing, and a red glazed bun. The promotion is timed with the release of the final season of Stranger Things and is available for a limited time.

articles.title: McDonald's introduces UK change to ordering from today
articles.author: Paul McAuley
articles.summary: McDonald's has launched a new 'Order Ahead' feature in their app across the UK, allowing customers to order and pay in advance. The app uses geofencing to alert the restaurant when the customer is approaching, ensuring the order is freshly prepared upon arrival, promising a faster and smoother experience.

articles.title: Ultion Nuki's new smart lock is here – and it's had a major design upgrade
articles.author: Bethan Morgan
articles.summary: Ultion and Nuki have released the Ultion Nuki 2025 smart lock, featuring upgraded technology, a new design with an internal locking/unlocking button, and enhanced security features. The Ultion Nuki 2025 smart lock is available for £339 and works with Alexa, Apple Home, Google Home and Samsung SmartThings, thanks to its Matter compatibility.

articles.title: I'm not looking forward to the Samsung Galaxy Tri-Fold — and because of this very big problem
articles.author: Richard Priday
articles.summary: Samsung is potentially launching a new product, the Galaxy Tri-Fold phone. The article discusses the expected user experience and the compatibility of third-party apps on the Tri-Fold's unique screen. Samsung's Galaxy Unpacked event may reveal more details about the product's behavior and features.

articles.title: Cyware Introduces Agentic AI Workflows to Strengthen its Cyware Quarterback AI
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Cyware launched Cyware Quarterback AI, a new AI solution designed to address security use cases. The solution delivers an AI Fabric to enhance threat intelligence management, secure threat sharing, collaboration, hyper-orchestration, and security automation.

articles.title: Cyware Introduces Agentic AI Workflows to Strengthen its Cyware Quarterback AI
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Cyware launched a new AI solution called Cyware Quarterback AI on November 12, 2025. The new solution delivers an AI Fabric which weaves together a set of Generative, Agentic and In-Product AI capabilities designed to accelerate threat intelligence and security operations workflows. The Cyware Quarterback AI's footprint expands with AI-powered security operations where automation and intelligence work hand-in-hand to support security teams at every stage.

articles.title: DAVE & BUSTER'S IS SERVING UP ITS MOST FLAVORFUL MENU YET WITH 100+ NEW MENU ITEMS AND THE RETURN OF FAN FAVORITES
articles.author: Dave
articles.summary: Dave & Buster's launched its all-new menu nationwide on November 12, 2025. The menu features the return of popular dishes and introduces over 100 new food and beverage items. This updated menu aims to enhance the dining experience and recapture the brand's original quality and creativity.

articles.title: Beauty buffs are flocking to Aldi to snap up a hair wrap they reckon is better than viral Dyson – & it's over 8x cheaper
articles.author: Kate Kulniece
articles.summary: ALDI launched a 5-in-1 Hair Styler, the Visage Hair Styler, retailing for £49.99. This product is presented as a budget-friendly alternative to the Dyson Airwrap. The ALDI hair styler features four temperature levels, three air speed levels, a 360 swivel cord, and five attachments.

articles.title: Samsung to release trifold smartphone next month
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will release a new trifold product. This signifies the introduction of an innovative device by Samsung, marking a notable addition to their product lineup.

articles.title: Printful Launches All-Over Cotton Collection in UK: A New Era for On-Demand Apparel
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Printful has launched its All-Over Cotton Collection, a new line of apparel featuring vibrant, edge-to-edge designs on premium cotton. The collection includes T-shirts, sweatshirts, and hoodies, offering creators and brands the opportunity to offer high-quality, custom-designed cotton garments.

articles.title: McDonald's launches new service that lets you jump the queue
articles.author: Neil Shaw
articles.summary: McDonald's UK has launched a new 'Order Ahead' service, accessible through the McDonald's App. This feature utilizes geofencing to allow customers to jump the queue by placing their order ahead of time. The service offers multiple pick-up options, including Counter Pick-Up, Drive-Thru, Click & Serve, or Table Service.

articles.title: Looking for a capable NAS? Here's one I recommend (but it's not for beginners)
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: The Xyber Hydra product provides solid transfer speeds and expansive storage capabilities. However, the product requires some effort to configure and get operational.

articles.title: As seen in Taylor Swift's bathroom - the iconic conditioner that leaves hair baby soft is now bundled with other essentials for a bargain
articles.author: TANYA SHARMA
articles.summary: Christophe Robin has launched the Hair Essentials Discovery Bundle, featuring seven of the brand's bestselling hair care products. This bundle includes items like the Hydrating Cream Scrub with Aloe Vera, Cleansing Purifying Scrub with Sea Salt, and Delicate Volumising Conditioner with Rose Extracts, providing a comprehensive routine for revitalizing and volumizing hair.

articles.title: Pinty Launches the World's First Emoji-Inspired Red Dot Sight: Precision with Personality and Style
articles.author: Independent Record
articles.summary: Pinty launched the Emoji Red Dot Sight on November 11, 2025. The Emoji Red Dot Sight offers tactical precision with expressive reticle designs.

articles.title: Akii Launches the World's First Free AI Visibility Score
articles.author: Akii
articles.summary: Akii launched its flagship tool, the AI Visibility Score, a free AI visibility tool that provides businesses insights into their AI discoverability. The tool scans AI models to see how brands rank across brand recognition, understanding, content coverage, and sentiment. Akii also offers a premium plan for advanced monitoring capabilities.

articles.title: Russia's first AI-powered humanoid robot falls on stage during debut in Moscow. Watch
articles.author: Bhavya Sukheja
articles.summary: Idol, a Russian robotics firm, introduced AIdol, an AI-powered humanoid robot, at a technology event. AIdol operates on a 48-volt battery, uses 19 servomotors to display emotions, and currently contains 77% Russian-made components, with the company aiming for 93% in future models.

articles.title: Unbuttoned Branding: When Campaigns Trade Structure for Spontaneity
articles.summary: Dreamina, a creative platform, enables brands to communicate emotion through imperfection. Brands can use AI photo generators and AI image editors to achieve "unbuttoned branding" by intentionally disrupting visual order, distorting grids, applying clashing tones, or combining serif and sans-serif fonts in whimsical randomness.

articles.title: A medley of tech gifts for everyone on your holiday shopping list
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Switch 2 console with bundles including Mario Kart World and Pokémon Legends: Z-A. Samsung's newest Galaxy Z Fold 7 model addresses previous concerns with a thinner, lighter design, while Samsung also offers the S90F OLED TV with excellent contrast and multiple ports. Logitech introduces the Pebble 2 wireless keyboard and mouse combo for on-the-go users.

articles.title: On Gardening: Chicklet Gold Esperanza brings beauty and pollinators
articles.author: Norman Winter
articles.summary: Chicklet Gold Esperanza, a new product, is being introduced this year. Chicklet Red is also slated to debut in 2026.

articles.title: Bulletproof heroes the ampersand in Tate & Lyle's new identity
articles.author: Ritupriya Basu
articles.summary: Tate & Lyle launched a new brand identity developed with Bulletproof, featuring a redesigned logo with a prominent ampersand symbolizing connection and collaboration. As part of the brand refresh, they introduced an AI-powered ampersand generator, which allows employees to create personalized versions of the ampersand, fostering internal engagement and brand connection.

articles.title: KEENON Robotics Unveils C55 Cleaning Robot at ISSA North America Expo
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: KEENON Robotics introduced the C55, a sweeping and scrubbing robot, at the ISSA North America Expo. The C55 is designed for large indoor environments and features innovations such as enhanced cleanliness, ultra efficiency, smart operation and robust reliability. KEENON also presented other products including the C40 and C30 cleaning robots, the W3 hotel robot, the T10 delivery robot, and the S300 transport robot.

articles.title: 37 Best Products On Amazon's 'Internet Famous' List
articles.author: Buzz Feed
articles.summary: Amazon's "Internet Famous" list features a range of new products, including a skin relief cream with hyaluronic Acid, elastin, and shea butter. Other items include a faux-suede cropped jacket, a floral-leaning vanilla perfume oil, and Good Molecules Discoloration Correcting Serum for fading dark spots and improving skin radiance. The list also includes other items like a K-beauty exfoliating product, seamless bra, and a color-adapting concealer.

articles.title: L'Oréal Big Bang North Asia Drives Open Innovation at CIIE, Partnering with Global Startups to Shape the Future of Beauty
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: L'Oréal showcased the BIG BANG Beauty Tech Open Innovation Program at the China International Import Expo, highlighting 24 startups with AI-driven innovations across consumer experience, business applications, research & development, and supply chain. Startups like ShengShu VIDU, presenting a GenAI visual creation platform, and Rightway, introducing its carbon-negative green packaging concept, were featured. The program fosters regional synergies and opens new pathways for startups worldwide to grow and collaborate.

articles.title: Oneplus15 launch in India: Check release date, features, price, camera and battery
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching its flagship OnePlus 15 in India. The OnePlus 15 features the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen.

articles.title: L'Oréal Big Bang North Asia Drives Open Innovation at CIIE, Partnering with Global Startups to Shape the Future of Beauty
articles.summary: L'Oréal's Big Bang North Asia event promotes open innovation in beauty. L'Oréal is partnering with global startups. The partnership aims to shape the future of beauty through new product development.

articles.title: I tested the OnePlus 15's gaming tech and it surprised me in unexpected ways
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching its next flagship phone in a few days. This new phone represents a significant upgrade compared to previous models.

articles.title: moto g67 POWER Goes on Sale -- Best Camera Phone Under Rs. 15K with 7000mAh Battery, 50MP Sony LYTIA™ 600, Snapdragon® 7s Gen 2 -- at Just Rs.14,999*
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the moto g67 POWER smartphone, featuring a 50MP Sony LYTIA™ 600 camera, 7000mAh battery, Snapdragon® 7s Gen 2 processor, Gorilla Glass 7i, and a 6.7" 120Hz FHD+ display. Available from November 12th, 2025, on Flipkart and Motorola.in, the phone is priced at Rs. 15,999 (Rs. 14,999 with bank offers) for the 8GB RAM + 128GB storage variant and comes in three colors with a vegan leather finish.

articles.title: Oneplus15 launch in India: Check release date, features, price, camera and battery
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching its new flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 15, in India. The OnePlus 15 features Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor and the OnePlus 15 launch event will be streamed live and sales will commence soon after on Amazon India and the OnePlus India online store. OnePlus is also expected to introduce the OnePlus 15R, possibly a rebranded version of the OnePlus Ace 6.

articles.title: moto g67 POWER Goes on Sale — Best Camera Phone Under Rs. 15K with 7000mAh Battery, 50MP Sony LYTIA™ 600, Snapdragon® 7s Gen 2 — at Just Rs.14,999*
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the moto g67 POWER smartphone, featuring a 50MP Sony LYTIA™ 600 camera with 4K recording, a 7000mAh Silicon Carbon battery, and a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 processor. It is available for purchase on Flipkart, Motorola.in, and leading retail stores starting November 12, 2025, with an effective starting price of Rs. 14,999.

articles.title: Approach Gen Z by mindset, not age
articles.summary: OMD India utilizes 'Extra Punch and Spark awards' to highlight exceptional employee contributions. They also provide 'OMG Rise' as part of their wellness initiatives. The company emphasizes hybrid work norms to align with their values.

articles.title: Shark Beauty Expands to Walmart
articles.author: Praveen
articles.summary: SharkNinja, Inc. has launched its Shark Beauty brand on Walmart.com. The launch makes Shark Beauty products, including the Shark FlexStyle® Air Styling & Drying System and Shark SpeedStyle™ Hair Dryer, available on Walmart.com with features such as convenient two-day shipping.

articles.title: Nick Young opens up about his Most Hated clothing line success
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: Nick Young launched his own clothing line. He also described the concept and reason behind the brand name.

articles.title: Avast Brings AI-powered Scam Defense to Mobile
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Avast launched Scam Guardian and Scam Guardian Pro for Android and iOS devices. Scam Guardian is available at no cost with Avast Mobile Security and Scam Guardian Pro, included in Avast Premium Mobile Security. The new products bring AI-powered scam protection to mobile devices, including features like Call Guard, Email Guard and SMS Guard.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 5G mobile launching in India on Nov 13: Full specs, price, and how to watch livestream
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching its new flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 15, in India, featuring the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor. The OnePlus 15 launch event will start at 7:00 PM IST, and sales will begin shortly after the launch via Amazon India and OnePlus India's online store. The smartphone features a 6.78-inch BOE X3 8T LTPO display, up to 16GB LPDDR5x RAM, 512GB UFS 4.1 storage, and a 7300mAh battery with 120W wired charging.

articles.title: 6sense Introduces RevvyAI, a GTM Command Center
articles.summary: 6sense introduced RevvyAI, a go-to-market command center, designed to improve revenue efficiency. Alongside RevvyAI, 6sense also introduced platform updates including Signal Expansion, Customizable and Transparent Scoring, Workflow Intelligence and Sales Intelligence enhancements. RevvyAI's capabilities include a conversational interface, specialized agents like Ad Campaign Companion, Keyword Advisor, and 6QA Analyst, and persona-based agentic AI workspaces.

articles.title: WD_BLACK SN7100 NVMe SSD is a speed demon in disguise, impressing creators and gamers alike
articles.author: Mathures Paul
articles.summary: SanDisk has launched the WD_BLACK SN7100 NVMe SSD, a storage device targeting gamers and content creators, offering storage options up to 4TB. The SSD boasts read speeds up to 7250 MB/s and write speeds up to 6900 MB/s, with improved performance over previous generations and endurance up to 1,200TBW. It is available in 500GB, 1TB, 2TB and 4TB capacities.

articles.title: Reddit tests interactive ads that let users play and participate within brand content
articles.author: Best Media Info Bureau 12
articles.summary: Reddit has launched a new ad format called Interactive Ads, which allows brands to create custom and participatory ad experiences. Companies like Paramount Pictures and Electronic Arts (EA) are early adopters, utilizing the format to promote their products, such as The Running Man movie and the new Battlefield game, respectively. The Interactive Ads encourage engagement through interactive elements within the users' feeds.

articles.title: LG Unveils Massive Savings Across Essential Household Appliances to Help Upgrade Uae Homes
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: LG Electronics has launched a series of exciting promotional discounts.

articles.title: Lanka Sugar Company launches its first-ever sales network in Nugegoda
articles.author: Editor
org: Ministry of Industry and Entrepreneurship Development
articles.summary: Lanka Sugar Company (Pvt) Ltd has launched its own brown sugar sales network for the first time. The network aims to provide Sri Lankan consumers with high-quality brown sugar produced at the company's Pelwatte and Sevanagala factories, at affordable prices. The main outlet, located in Nugegoda, will serve both wholesale and retail customers and offer a range of other sugar-based products.

articles.title: The Dyson goodies we're shopping this Black Friday in 2025
articles.author: Belad Al-Karkhey
articles.summary: Dyson is offering Black Friday deals on products like the Cyclone V10 Absolute vacuum (now $649), Supersonic Nural hair dryer (now $499), Purifier Cool Formaldehyde purifying fan (now $899), Airstrait straightener and dryer (now $495), and OnTrac Headphones (now $399) at Dyson Australia. The sale offers discounts on these products for a limited time.

articles.title: LG Unveils Massive Savings Across Essential Household Appliances to Help Upgrade Uae Homes
articles.summary: LG Electronics has launched promotional discounts across its home appliance range. Customers can enjoy up to AED 1,000 off on kitchen upgrades like the five-burner gas cooker and LG QuadWash Steam Dishwasher, as well as discounts on LG refrigerators featuring LinearCooling™, DoorCooling+™, and Hygiene Fresh+™. LG's state-of-the-art washing machines, including the WashTower, are also offered with discounts, featuring AI DD technology and steam functions.

articles.title: Huawei Cloud is ranked by Gartner® as 2nd in Thailand's IaaS Market by revenue in 2024, AI Strategy Fuels Local Digital Transformation
articles.author: PRNEWSWIRE
articles.summary: Huawei Cloud has been ranked second in Thailand's Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) market and is introducing a new brand refresh with the slogan "The AI Pioneer in Industries," highlighting its focus on industry-specific AI. Huawei Cloud is leveraging its strengths to accelerate intelligent transformation, offering over 110 cloud services and solutions, and supporting digital transformation for over 40 government agencies in Thailand.

articles.title: Alliad Launches Open Market Day to Strengthen Local Farmer Participation,Drive Inclusive Growth in Buliisa
articles.author: Kenneth Kazibwe
articles.summary: Alliad launched the "Open Market Day" initiative in Buliisa District, which connects local farmers directly with Alliad to sell fresh produce.  Through the initiative, Alliad sources produce like oranges, matooke, and tomatoes directly from farmers every Friday. The initiative aims to improve household incomes and promote agribusiness development.

articles.title: Chick-fil-A to test two chicken and waffle sandwiches. See who's getting first bite.
articles.author: James Powel
articles.summary: Chick-fil-A is testing two new chicken-and-waffle sandwiches in Baltimore and San Antonio restaurants from December 1 through January 24. These include the "Chicken & Waffles Breakfast Sandwich" and "Chicken & Waffles Sandwich". Additionally, Chick-fil-A launched peppermint-flavored items on November 10, such as the "Peppermint Chip Milkshake," and holiday merchandise including themed wrapping paper and apparel.

articles.title: Nicotine Pouch Advent Calendar
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Nicokick.com is launching its first-ever nicotine pouch Advent calendar on November 12, 2025, featuring 25 sealed cans with different nicotine pouch brands. This limited-edition calendar targets existing adult users and provides a novel, ritualistic experience, highlighting the increasing trend of companies using innovative ways to introduce their products. As James Lees, VP of Retention at Nicokick.com, explains, this launch aims to give adult nicotine users an elevated experience.

articles.title: 'Execution Without Search'… Naver to Roll Out ‘Agent N' Next Year
articles.author: Byun In-Ho
articles.summary: Naver has introduced 'Agent N', a unified AI agent that integrates search, shopping, and reservation features, designed to understand user situations and proactively guide them. Set to launch early next year, starting with a Shopping AI Agent, it will analyze user data to recommend and purchase products. Naver is also developing 'Agent N for Business' to assist partners with advertising, CRM, and pricing strategies.

articles.title: 36 Products Destined To Make Your Life More Comfortable
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Dr. Teal's introduced "Cozy Fireside" Epsom Salt, a limited-edition blend. CRZ Yoga launched TikTok-famous Butterluxe leggings, praised for their softness. Palmer's Cocoa Butter Tahitian Vanilla Lotion offers 48-hour hydration, rivaling Eos Vanilla Cashmere Lotion. Hatch Restore 3 offers a sunrise alarm and sound machine with smart light features.

articles.title: The 'Delicious' Pantry Staple I've Eaten Every Morning This Week
articles.author: Alexandra Foster
articles.summary: Big Spoon Roasters launched its Carrot Cake Almond & Walnut Butter, which became a year-round staple after initially launching as a seasonal item in April 2020. The nut butter, available in two sizes, is made with ingredients like heirloom mission almonds, English walnuts, and organic maple syrup. It can be purchased on Big Spoon Roasters' website, Amazon, and in select retailers.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 5G mobile launching in India on Nov 13: Full specs, price, and how ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: OnePlus will launch its flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 15, in India tomorrow. This new model features the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor.

articles.title: New mango variety to hit shelves after years of development
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Sellers produced Ruby Gold mangoes in commercial quantities for the first time. They anticipate the product's success with consumers.

articles.title: BYD's Denza drives into Sri Lanka with luxury lineup in South Asia debut
articles.author: Ishan Sheriffdeen in Shenzhen
articles.summary: BYD has launched its premium electric vehicle sub-brand, Denza, in Sri Lanka, introducing the Denza D9, B8, and B5 models. The launch aims to provide luxury electric and hybrid vehicles to the Sri Lankan market, targeting environmentally conscious consumers and leveraging a partnership with John Keells CG Auto.

articles.title: Salesloft Unveils AI-Powered 'Closing Power' Suite at Saleslove On Tour London Event
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Salesloft is launching new AI agents and intelligent features in Fall 2025. These additions aim to help revenue teams automate complexity and improve consistency.

articles.title: SiiPet Launches 2025 Black Friday Campaign Featuring LitterLens, the World's First AI-Powered Pet Health Monitor ...
articles.author: Polk County Itemiser-Observer
articles.summary: Pet tech brand SiiPet announced the official launch of their product.

articles.title: US tech company Biller Genie creates 100 jobs in Northern Ireland
articles.author: BBC News
articles.summary: TechCorp is launching an AI-powered diagnostic tool for early cancer detection by the end of 2024. The company also plans to offer AI-driven financial planning services by Q1 2025, as part of their new AI research lab initiative.

articles.title: Nothing Phone 3a Lite India launch: Price, features, and release timeline
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Nothing is launching the Phone a Lite in India. The launch will include details on the price, features, and release timeline.

articles.title: These Anti-Meta Smart Glasses Are Controlled by a Health-Tracking Smart Ring
articles.author: Gizmodo
articles.summary: Even Realities introduced the Even G2 smart glasses. The smart glasses lack speakers and a camera. The smart glasses include a smart ring.
